mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_BOARD ORDER BY GROUP_ID DESC, G_LEVEL ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD VALUES( (SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(BNO)+1) FROM TB_BOARD), #{title}, #{content}, #{author}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, AUTHOR = #{author} WHERE BNO = #{bno}
